participants.name: John McLaughlin
participants.title: CEO /President at Westside Water Sports, Inc.

messages.message: Hi Brian. Nice to e-meet you and tanks for an invitation to connect. Was there something in my profile that resonates with you? Let me know if I can ever be a resource. John
Thank you for connecting! Wow you're fast.
I searched philanthropist and found you :D
H20 sports sounds awesome! What are you working on?

We are working on two cable wake parks. Google it if you are not sure what that is. We also have aqua parks too. We own and operate them. The first one will be open soon. Sorry we don't have a website yet to direct you to.
That is awesome! I looked it up. Looks fun! Let me know if you need a software leader to set up that website ;)
What would you charge to set up a website? You can google Texas ski ranch and look at there site as a way to see what they did. Where are you located?
Depends on what you want but usually $50 per hour or about $40-80k total.
Located I Phoenix. Is Texas ski club a site you like that you would model after?
I am open to a different design. Something cool and different would be kind of great. I just sent the Texas ski ranch as an idea. I am in Gilbert. Maybe we can hook up one day next week.
I'd love to. Anytime after 3:30 works for me. I work at the downtown office so that is just a hop and a skip away. Let me know anytime.
Sounds good. As soon as I know my schedule next week I will send you some options after 330. Thanks.

I almost forgot about our possible job opportunity. There are a few approaches if you are looking to set up a marketing site. 
1) I can help you find/recommend some local WordPress developers
2) set you up with weebly or wiz and you can modify the site yourself through their platform
3) build a web app myself under your direction
